Fairy Sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
Fairy Sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age. Even pet friendly!

Roman Candles.name: Roman Candles
Roman Candles.description: Your everyday Roman Candle, ready to set any unsuspecting forest on fire. Use it to torment little sisters too!

Sky Rockets.name: Sky Rockets
Sky Rockets.description: Make the mirth of Gandalf your own with these party favorites

Bottle Rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
Bottle Rockets.description: Great for neighborhood light shows. Bad when launching hundreds at a time and the bottle tips your way.

Fizzing Whisbies.name: Fizzing Whisbies
Fizzing Whisbies.description: Delores Umbridge is a piece of crap and deserves everything she got.

Tuna Surprise.name: Tuna Surprise
Tuna Surprise.description: The first of its kind: The exploding fireball emits a strong whiff of tuna surprise

Arney's Explosion.name: Arney's Explosion
Arney's Explosion.description: Pure C4 sourced from the deepest, darkest corners of the black market

Fire Parade.name: Fire Parade
Fire Parade.description: Literally a flame thrower that launches on the back of a rocket

TNT.name: TNT
TNT.description: Wiley Coyote has had a turn or two with this fire thrower

Funky Foam.name: Funky Foam
Funky Foam.description: kept in toothpaste bottles, this highly corrosive and flammable substance will take the door off any vault

Touchy Tuna.name: Touchy Tuna
Touchy Tuna.description: A taxidermy tuna loaded with gunpowder and a fuse. Comes with matches.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.description: You've heard of fire tornados? Well hold on to your butts

Something else.name: Something else
Something else.description: this thing explodes, but not much else is known about it

Shit Fire.name: Shit Fire
Shit Fire.description: With only two ingredients, you'll be shocked at the punch this bomb packs

Dragon's Egg.name: Dragon's Egg
Dragon's Egg.description: The lore that arose out of the Medieval times has proved true.

Rocket Man.name: Rocket Man
Rocket Man.description: This Elton John classic can be heard for miles upon detonation

David Bowie's Last Flight.name: David Bowie's Last Flight
David Bowie's Last Flight.description: This only explodes in the vacuum of space, so terrestrial residents need not fear

Watusi.name: Watusi
Watusi.description: It explodes, but only on a very very small scale, so small the naked eye can't see it.
